text: The #covid19 #vaccine is rolling out in MA. But some people are on the fence. TODAY at 12pm on @CityLine5 @KarenHolmesWard finds out how the pandemic & vaccines are impacting the lives of two Boston families. @OjikutuBisola @BrighamWomens @OnWCVB #wcvb #aka1908 #Alphaphialpha https://t.co/0E9ukm9OfJ
